availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Kentucky allen county
Allen County Court Call term March
March 21st 1862.

C W Hatler Jailor of Allen county having resigned his office as Jailor of Said County as appears of record. whereby his office is vacated. It is therefore ordered that Said Hatler be and is hereby appointed to fill out the remainder of his term of office
I Samuel Carpenter Clerk protem of the Allen County Court.

Certify that the foregoing is a true copy of the order of the Allen County Court appointing made at its call term March 21st 1862. appointing C W Hatler Jailor of Said County to fill out the unexpired term of his office
given under my hand this 27th day of March 1862
